channel.title: Comments on: The Pee Tree, The Urinal Game and MAPSU
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: arielcohen
item.dc:creator: arielcohen
item.description: This can realy save space - few guys could pee on the same tree at the same time. btw, it can be placed inside public toilets were dogs are not allowed (not like in women's public toilets were bitches are allowed to get in).
item.content:encoded: This can realy save space – few guys could pee on the same tree at the same time. btw, it can be placed inside public toilets were dogs are not allowed (not like in women’s public toilets were bitches are allowed to get in).
